common.errorFetchingLocation: Sorry, we couldn't fetch your current location. Please type your location manually.

common.loremIpsum: loremIpsum Morbi nulla aliquam lectus mauris sed amet
common.typeDescription: Please tell us more about the issue you are facing
common.subject: Subject
common.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
common.invalidLink: Can not open one of these links.
common.sharingUrlCopied: Sharing URL copied to the clipboard
common.somethingWentWrongText: Something went wrong obtaining access token
common.wantToLeave: Are you sure want to leave?
common.integrityDescription: Build a community of property owners, renters and buyers, with integrity. Our core values are at the center of our work and how we interact with our clients.
common.trustDescription: Trust is the core of our beliefs and it defines how we engage with our clients. From commitments to data privacy to clear transactions, we focus on building trust in every area of our business.
common.transparencyDescription: Property management is all about trust. And, the only way to build trust is through transparent processes that spell out each detail ensuring open and honest transfer of information.
common.aboutDescription: There are a lot of investors, like us, who while living abroad, want to invest in real estate across one or more investment grade cities around the world or in their native countries. We realized that we were struggling to manage investment properties remotely while meeting the demands of a full-time job.
common.plansSectionHeader: Find the Right plan for your Property
common.signupCarouselDescription: Especially for Tenants. Search, Locate, Negotiate and Rent on our app
common.serverError: We are having trouble connecting to our servers, please check back in some time
common.deleteReviewText: Once deleted, this review won't be visible to anyone. This action cannot be undone.
common.noWebCamDescription: We noticed that your current device does not have a camera attached. Due to this you will have to use our mobile apps to complete the verification process.
common.uploadWarning: You can upload a maximum of 10 images
common.faqText: If you cannot find answer to your question in our FAQ, you can always contact us. We will answer to you shortly!
common.happyToHelp: We are always happy to help.
common.answerFaster: The best way to get answer faster.

landing.freeForYou: Homzhub App completely free for you

microSite.overviewSteps:
Manage your property without any hassles on our digital platform from anywhere, anytime. Download our app and start managing your properties for free. 
 For owners with properties in Pune and Nagpur, we offer end-to-end property management services as well.
microSite.homzhubTagLine: One app for all your real estate needs!
microSite.freeDownload: Hassle-free property management on our digital platform from anywhere, anytime. Download our app and start managing your properties for free.
microSite.PuneNagpurOwners: For owners with properties in Pune and Nagpur, we offer end-to-end property management services at a premium.
